name: Claude Code Containers
description: Automated GitHub issue processing system powered by Claude Code
author: Claude Code Team

deploy.build_command: npm install && cd container_src && npm install && npm run build

secrets.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
secrets.description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude Code access

post_deploy: 1. Your Claude Code Container is now deployed!
2. Create a GitHub App and get your Installation ID
3. Configure your GitHub App using the /config endpoint
4. Test by creating an issue in your repository
